SEARCH
Package com.example.summit.adapters

Class AdminEventAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AdminEventAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.summit.adapters.AdminEventAdapter
public class AdminEventAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AdminEventAdapter.ViewHolder>
RecyclerView adapter for displaying and managing events in the admin dashboard.

This adapter provides: - Display of event information (ID, title, date, location) - Checkbox selection for individual events - Bulk selection/deselection capabilities - Real-time selection change notifications via callback interface

Selection state is maintained in a HashSet of event IDs, allowing efficient lookup and modification. The adapter notifies the parent fragment when selection changes so the UI can update accordingly (e.g., enable delete button, update count).

      Clears any existing selection and notifies the adapter of the data change.

    • filterEvents

      public void filterEvents(List<Event> filtered)
      Updates the adapter with a filtered list of events.

      Does not modify the complete events list or clear selection. Used after applying search/filter/sort operations.

      Parameters:

    • onBindViewHolder

      public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull AdminEventAdapter.ViewHolder holder, int position)
      Binds event data to the ViewHolder and sets up selection listeners.

      Updates the UI elements with event information and configures: - Checkbox state based on whether the event is selected - Checkbox listener to update selection and notify the callback - Item click listener to toggle checkbox when the card is clicked

      Specified by:
      onBindViewHolder in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AdminEventAdapter.ViewHolder>
      Parameters:
      holder - The ViewHolder to bind data to
      position - The position of the item in the filtered events list
